synopsis.text: Earth becomes the target of a mysterious extraterrestrial force, leading to an unexpected turn of events at Paradise Elementary School. A colossal sword plummets from the sky, transforming the school into a formidable airborne fortress. With the planet's future hanging in the balance, a group of young students finds themselves chosen to command powerful mecha, known as Daiteioh, to thwart the alien invasion. This captivating story unfolds as a promotional video for its manga serialization in Monthly Daiteioh magazine, after plans for a TV anime series were initially set aside. Join these brave kids as they embark on a thrilling adventure to save Earth from imminent danger!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
